entry.title: Sunday: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries. Rainfall amount 2 mm except snowfall amount 2 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature steady near zero.
